Title: Passing on a historical song along the banks of the Wanquan River
Publisher: Guangdong renmin chubanshe (广东人民出版社)
Notes: Female militia members sing The Internationale along the Wanquan River, Hainan Province. This was an important location in the ballet Red Detachment of Women ( 红色娘子军), one of the 'Model Works' during the Cultural Revolution.
